content: Niclas Kupper has marked this topic as resolved.

How about also defining epoisson_pmf (l : ennreal) (k : enat) and a lemma that if l is finite then it is the same as your poisson_pmf? [Or perhaps just defining poisson on ennreal / enat, not sure.] Defining a Poisson process on a space of infinite measure would be tedious to do without it.
